product_name: Salomon Ivy Boa STR8JKT Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Salomon Ivy Boa STR8JKT snowboard boots feature Boa(R) lacing and the STR8JKT internal lacing to keep your feet locked in place for superior control and comfort while you ride the whole mountain. Design features a medium forward flex and forgiving lateral movement for execution and stability on all types of terrain. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering as well as exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. STR8JKT lacing system combines Boa Coiler with an internal lacing system on liners for a superior fit without over-tightening your boots. Women-specific liner construction provides personalized support and solid heel hold for narrow heels; liners are custom moldable at your local REI store for extra comfort. Toasty Toes and all-around furry linings keep feet warm and comfortable on bitter-cold days. Preshaped footbeds provide stabilize your feet in the boots, offer arch support and distribute pressure evenly across your soles; antimicrobial finish helps keep odors at bay. Women's low-profile, anatomic soles are lightweight and well damped for excellent cushioning and power transmission to your board.
